title: FS: T206 Helm PSA 6 Old Mill
author: honus94566

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Helm PSA 6 Old Mill
posts.post_content:
I have decided to let go of this beauty in order to use the cash to go after my current interests - N172s and M116s.

T206 J. Ross Helm, PSA 6 EX-MT, Old Mill Back. 

[img]http://co.llect.com/i/12511/nASYq.jpg[/img]

I purchased this card from Trae at t206.org last December, you can see the thread here:
[url]http://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=144584[/url]

It's been in safe keeping ever since.

Asking $625 which was what I paid for it. PayPal, or money order. 

I will include free insured shipping (via FedEx 2-Day)

If you are interested, send me a PM. Thanks!
